actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to reduce the number of reports which the Department of Defense is required to submit to the Congress.

summary.text: Defense Reports Reduction Act - Terminates congressional reporting requirements for the Department of Defense on January 1, 1991. Establishes a policy for exceptions to such termination when there is a compelling reporting requirement and efforts to reduce unnecessary reporting requirements have been made and such a report is still justified.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the number of reports which the Department of Defense is required to submit to the Congress.
